sections.content:
Question:
Does RA0 Series support IEC60730/60335?
Answer:
RA0 series will provide application notes and self-test libraries on how to use flexible sample software routines to assist with compliance with IEC60730 class B safety standards.
Please contact our sales for release dates.
Suitable Products
RA0E1
